titleStmt.title: Considerations tending to remove the present differences, and to settle vnity, peace, and piety for the present and future. Written from the Sommer Islands by R. Norvvood. And sent over to further the reconciliation of his native country.
titleStmt.author: Norwood, Richard, 1590?-1675.
